title: Chicken Livers with Gorgonzola Polenta
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '450g chicken livers, trimmed and chopped', '1 medium onion, sliced', '1 green pepper, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '7 mushrooms, sliced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes, drained', '225ml white wine', 'salt and pepper to taste', '500ml chicken stock', '180g polenta', '175ml milk', '110g Gorgonzola cheese, crumbled']
